detail_desc: Elastic hairbands in various colours with silicone on the inside to hold the hair in place. Width 1 cm.
Cap in cotton twill with an appliqué on the front and adjustable plastic fastener at the back.

Hi-top boots in waterproof functional fabric with imitation leather details, a padded edge, elasticated lacing and a hook and loop fastening at the front. Lightly padded tongue that can easily be pulled forward to make it easier to put the boots on. Reflective details, fleece linings and insoles and chunky thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and narrow hems. Soft jersey lining for extra warmth.

Padded parka in sturdy fabric with a stand-up collar and detachable, faux shearling-lined hood with a faux fur trim. Concealed zip down the front with a wind flap and visible buttons. Handwarmer pockets with a press-stud, patch front pockets with a flap and button, a zipped sleeve pocket and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Lined.
Imitation leather purse with a zip around the top, card slots and a zipped coin compartment. Lined. Size 2x10x19.5 cm.
Jumper in a soft, fine cotton knit with dropped shoulders, long balloon sleeves and narrow ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Treggings in sturdy jersey with elastication and a press-stud at the waist and fake zipped front pockets.
Patterned beach hat with a flounced brim and ties under the chin. Width of brim 6 cm.

Long, sleeveless dress in woven fabric with a V-neck and wrapover with a concealed button at the front, and a V-neck at the back. Gathers at the shoulders, pleats at the top, a gathered seam at the waist and concealed zip in one side. Lined.
Blouse in an airy, patterned cotton weave with a collar, heart-shaped buttons down the front and a gathered yoke at the back. Short, flounced sleeves, a heart-shaped chest pocket and ties at the hem.
Mittens knitted in soft cotton with faux fur pompoms and ribbed, foldover cuffs. Size 2-6 months with no thumbs.
Bolero in fine-knit cotton with a faceted, heart-shaped button and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs.
Short-sleeved top in stretch, ribbed cotton jersey with a decorative button band down the front.
Tiered skirt in soft, printed organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Top in soft cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs, slits in the sides and long sleeves with a text print. Slightly longer at the back.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline.
Leggings in soft jersey with an elasticated waist and contrasting colour print motifs.
Sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with short cap sleeves.

Long-sleeved playsuit in airy, patterned, crinkled chiffon with a V-neck and wrapover front with a concealed press-stud. Seam at the waist, a concealed zip in one side and short legs. Frill trim down the sleeves and at the hems. Partly lined.
Metal bangles in different designs.
Treggings in sturdy jersey with elastication and a visible press-stud at the waist, fake fly and sewn-in creases.
Shorts in soft cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets and a fake jetted back pocket with a button.
Knitted top with a deep V-neck front and back and narrow, tie-top shoulder straps.
Chelsea boots with elastic gores in the sides, a loop at the back and a decorative welt seam around the soles. Canvas linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel approx. 3 cm.
Long-sleeved top in soft organic cotton jersey with glitter.
Ballet pumps in imitation leather with pointed toes. Linings in satin made from recycled polyester and insoles in imitation leather.
Short dress in woven fabric with a print motif on the front, a small opening with a button at the back, and short sleeves.
Balaclava knitted in a soft cotton blend with decorative ears on the top. Fleece lining.

Parka in a woven modal blend with an unlined hood, loose yoke, zip down the front and drawstring at the waist. Side pockets, elasticated cuffs, a drawstring at the hem and a single back vent. Unlined.
Brazilian briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
Short, boxy top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a motif on the front, dropped shoulders, long, slightly wider sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Calf-length dress in airy chiffon with a small, frilled collar and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with smocked, frilled cuffs, a smocked seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Sewn in jersey underdress.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist and lacing at the sides.
Hat in braided straw with a chiffon band. Width of brim 5.5 cm.
Shorts in washed, stretch denim with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Maxi dress in an airy, patterned weave with a V-neck front and back, long balloon sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, and an elasticated seam at the waist. Partly lined.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a cotton blend.

Shirt jacket in sturdy denim made from a cotton blend with a collar and buttons down the front. Low dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Unlined. The polyester content of the jacket is partly recycled.
Jumper knitted in a soft mohair blend with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Blouse woven in a patterned viscose blend with a frill around the neckline, dropped shoulders with gathers, and long sleeves with elasticated, frill-trimmed cuffs. Yoke and press-studs at the back.
Cap in cotton twill with an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.

Straight-cut blouse in silk with a grandad collar, buttons down the front and a double yoke with seams on the shoulders and at the back. Long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, and a straight-cut hem with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Shorts in a jacquard weave with a slight sheen. Regular waist that is elasticated at the back, pleats at the front, side pockets and wide legs.
Blouse in an airy, patterned weave with a smocked stand-up collar, narrow velvet ties around the neckline and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with flounced cuffs.
Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with a mesh racer back, lined cups with removable inserts and an elasticated hem. Extra firm support.
Blouse in slub-weave viscose with a V-neck, buttons down the front and short puff sleeves with smocked trims.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, superstretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and button and straight legs.

Calf-length skirt in a softly draping Tencel™ lyocell and silk weave with gathered, covered elastication at the waist. Inset panels at the sides to create draping and volume, and an asymmetric hem. Unlined.
Long T-shirt in slub jersey with a sequined motif on the front and slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
Knee-length shorts in soft, washed cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets and a fake welt back pocket.
Yoga top in fast-drying functional fabric with a deep neckline and mesh section at the back.
Biker jacket in soft imitation leather with quilted, padded sections on the shoulders and at the cuffs. Small stand-up collar, a diagonal zip down the front and zipped front pockets. Lined.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric with gently dropped shoulders with press-studs at one side, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Balconette bra in jersey with underwired, moulded, padded cups that lift and shape, and a slightly wider fastening at the back with three pairs of hooks and eyes. Narrow, detachable shoulder straps included.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fully lined bikini. Flounced top with narrow shoulder straps with a small metal decoration attached to one strap. Matching bottoms.
Fully lined bikini. Flounced top with narrow shoulder straps, one of which has a small metal decoration. Matching bottoms.
Jeggings in soft, stretch denim with an elasticated waist, fake fly and fake front pockets.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif, and narrow ribbing around the neckline.
Sleeveless blouse in an airy weave with a collar, buttons down the front, chest pocket, yoke with pleat at the back and ties at the hem.
Fitted strappy top in soft jersey made from a cotton blend.

Faux shearling-lined shirt jacket in cotton twill with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a button, and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Quilted sleeve lining in woven fabric.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.
3/4-length leggings in soft, organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Short, fitted, off-the-shoulder dress in soft cotton jersey with decorative metal eyelets around the neckline and long sleeves.
Blouse in an airy weave with a collar, deep V-neck and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with a tab and button, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Metal earrings with a hoop pendant and plastic stone. Length 5 cm.
Short beach kaftan in an airy weave with lace trims. Short, wide sleeves, and a drawstring at the waist.
Sandals in imitation suede and imitation leather. Adjustable ankle strap with a metal buckle, imitation leather linings and insoles and fluted soles.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, and straight legs.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist, ties at the sides and medium coverage at the back.
Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with side pockets and wide elastication with a drawstring at the waist. The cotton content of the shorts is organic.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Long sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Shorter top in sweatshirt fabric with a stand-up collar, zip at the top, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
3/4-length trousers in sturdy satin with an elasticated waist, side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Pre-tied tie in satin with an adjustable elastic strap and plastic fastener. Width 5 cm.

Checked shirt in a cotton weave with a turn-down collar, classic front and open chest pocket. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke with a pleat and hanger loop at the back, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Hipster briefs in microfibre and lace with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Hoop earrings in different designs. One metal pair and one pair in plastic and metal. Diameter approx. 3 cm.
